item.title: On Semicolons
item.description:
Introduction

If I’m being entirely honest, I only have a vague idea on how to use semicolons in writing; I know it has to do with separating stuff, but that’s about it. So why exactly, you might be wondering, am I writing about semicolons on my personal blog?

It was a bright summer’s day and I was in my darkened room lurking on LinkedIn, as one tends to do on days like that, when I came across the most bizarre comment.
